com.navis.framework.persistence

Interface IIndexManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexManager

    public interface IIndexManager
    This interface define indexes creation method
    Author:
    Andrey Ignatenko, May 21, 2009

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BEAN_ID 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addIndex(ICarinaIndex inCarinaIndex)
      This adds an index to the database, corresponding to the inIndex Object
      boolean addIndex(java.lang.String inTableName, java.lang.String inIndexName, java.lang.String[] inColumnNames)
      This adds an index for given table and columns to the database
      void addMissedIndexes(java.util.List<ICarinaIndex> inMissedIndexes)
      This method finds missed indexes (single and multicolumn) and creates them This eliminates upgrade actions to add indexes
      void dropIndex(ICarinaIndex inIndex)
      This drops an index from the database, corresponding to the inIndex Object
      java.util.List<ICarinaIndex> getMissedIndexesToAdd()

    • Method Detail

      • addMissedIndexes

        void addMissedIndexes(@NotNull
                      java.util.List<ICarinaIndex> inMissedIndexes)
        This method finds missed indexes (single and multicolumn) and creates them This eliminates upgrade actions to add indexes

      • getMissedIndexesToAdd

        @NotNull
java.util.List<ICarinaIndex> getMissedIndexesToAdd()
        Returns:
        list of indexes which declared in HBM file but don't exist in the database and could be added. This list doesn't include spatial indexes that cannot be added on the application startup.

      • addIndex

        boolean addIndex(@NotNull
                 ICarinaIndex inCarinaIndex)
        This adds an index to the database, corresponding to the inIndex Object
        Parameters:
        inCarinaIndex -
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if the index already exists

      • dropIndex

        void dropIndex(@NotNull
               ICarinaIndex inIndex)
        This drops an index from the database, corresponding to the inIndex Object
        Parameters:
        inIndex - carina index object

      • addIndex

        boolean addIndex(@Nullable
                 java.lang.String inTableName,
                 @Nullable
                 java.lang.String inIndexName,
                 @Nullable
                 java.lang.String[] inColumnNames)
        This adds an index for given table and columns to the database
        Parameters:
        inTableName - table name
        inIndexName - index name
        inColumnNames - column names
        Returns:
        true if sucessfull
